title: Avogadro's Number
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Est. since the 1970s, this restaurant specializes in house-made tempeh in sandwiches and burgers. It's also a music venue with inside and outside stages. An expansive back patio overlooked by a treehouse for the children to play in and skirted by a river-esque water feature.
